name: Phantom (itch) (phantomgame)
description:
Phantom is a sinister and comedic, single-player, 3D exploration puzzle game where you play as the ghost of a former actor haunting the theatre you died in. 

As a ghost, you have no physical form to walk around in. Instead, you must exact your revenge on the cast and crew responsible for your death by possessing props and objects backstage. Wield the items you inhabit to kill your targets in unique puzzles. Decipher the true cause of your mysterious death by overhearing saucy conversations, spooking the cast, and discovering discarded evidence. 

Temitope Olujobi: Game Designer, Artist

Rachel Moeller: Game Designer, Programmer

Shak’ar Mujukian: Music

Jordan Jones-Brewster: Additional Voice Acting

Follow our Twitter for updates

Recommended Windows Specs

OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or Radeon 580 or equivalent 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 5 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard

How to Open

  • Download the Phantom game file.
  • Extract it.
  • Navigate to PhantomWindows_64bit -> PhantomWindows_64bit -> WindowsNoEditor
  • Open the "ThesisWeek2" executable.
  • If prompted,  click "more info" and accept.

PC Button Mapping

  • Mouse - Move reticle
  • Hold Left Mouse Button - See all nearby possessable items
    • Release - Posses an item
  • Space - Perform item action (if possible)
  • WASD - Move as possessed item (if possible)
  • M - Pause/Settings Menu
  • Escape - Quit

Controller Button Mapping

  • Right Stick - Move reticle
  • Hold Left Trigger - See all nearby possessable items
    • Release - Posses an item
  • Bottom Face Button (A) - Perform item action (if possible)
  • Left Stick - Move as possessed item (if possible)
  • Special Right - Pause/Settings Menu
